item.title: TV - IPTV for Enterprise & Hospitality
item.description:
Overview

Our IPTV solution provides scalable, high-quality video streaming for enterprise and hospitality environments. Perfect for hotels, hospitals, corporate offices, and educational institutions.

Key Features

  • Multi-channel Broadcasting: Support for live TV, on-demand content, and custom channels
  • Content Management: Easy-to-use dashboard for managing programming and schedules
  • Interactive Services: Weather, news, local information, and custom messaging
  • Quality Assurance: HD/4K streaming with adaptive bitrate technology

Benefits

  • Enhance guest experience with premium entertainment options
  • Reduce operational costs compared to traditional cable systems
  • Centralized content control across all locations
  • Professional presentation of corporate communications

Technical Specifications

  • Protocols: HTTP, RTSP, RTP, UDP multicast
  • Formats: H.264, H.265, MP4, MPEG-2
  • Bandwidth: Optimized for various network conditions
  • Devices: Smart TVs, set-top boxes, mobile devices, tablets
